encodingDesc.p: This file encoded to comply with EpiDoc Guidelines and Schema version 8 http://www.stoa.org/epidoc/gl/5/

revisionDesc.change: Finalized - Revised text and updated metadata.

Vote - Accept-Straight-to-Finalization - Add line number to instances of lost.?lin; Ar delete [.?] at line beginning; 2-3 add iota adscript; 3-4 correct hyphen; 8 correct ς; 6 add vac.1; Av1-3 use 1,msup etc.; 1 [α .1] separate supplement from gap; Av Col.1 correct gaps at line beginning; 1-2 correct hyphen; 2 [οις .2] separate supplement from gap; 5 |alt|; col. 2.6 middle sigma; Bv 2 delete [.?]; 2 and 4-7 correct hyphen; 3 high-punctus.

General - This papyrus has been digitally edited by Francesco Maniglia and revised by (Reviewer’s Name) during an Erasmus+ BIP workshop (Intensive ENCODE: Digital Competences in Ancient Writing Cultures) in collaboration with the project PRIN2022-INTEGRATION. INTEllectual miGRATION: circulation of philosophical books and ideas around the ancient Mediterranean through the evidence of Graeco-Roman papyri (CUP: B53D23023140006; P.I. Valeria Piano)
